By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.`` Larry Page credited Eric Schmidt with running the company`` brilliantly while keeping the`` headstrong founders'' involved.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.
